other-name:other-name.other-name:content: Joao Pedro Pedroso Ramos dos Santos

person:biography.personal-details:content: João Pedro Pedroso was born in Porto, Portugal, in 1966, and is presently auxiliary professor at the Faculty of Sciences of the University of Porto. He teaches courses on operational research, artificial intelligence, heuristic methods for optimization, and computer programming, at the Department of Computer Science. Research being carried out concerns mainly computational methods for tackling combinatorial optimization problems, often involving simulation and machine learning, with applications in decision support. He publishes and acts as a reviewer in leading international journals in the area, and co-authored two books on computer programming for optimization.

education:education-summary.common:department-name: Center for Operations Research and Econometrics
